content: @Chris Moesel and I have been mulling over the creation of a new shorthand language that allows specification of FHIR profiles, instances, examples, search parameters, etc in a very concise form. If you are at the Atlanta Connectathon, we're having a breakout session in International 7 from 3-4 today (Sunday). We're going to discuss designing of a "no-more-tears" approach to creating the content for ballot-ready, high-quality FHIR Implementation Guides.
Oh man, sorry I missed this, in CDS Hooks breakout now.
Would love to catch up on this, are there notes from the session?

Hey @Bryn Rhodes -- I'm not sure if anyone took any notes, but I'm sure @Mark Kramer could fill you in and even show you a few examples of a possible syntax. I think he's still in Atlanta through Wednesday.
